deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @notice the function is to be called by the owner to initialize the fees after upgrade
@notice the function is to only mitigate the bad storage after upgrade.

depositToken(address,uint256).details: the function is to be called by the stableswap wrapper to deposit tokens

params._amount: the amount of tokens to be deposited
params._token: the address of the token to be deposited

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: the function withdraws whole balance of both the tokensFees is also withdrawn, so once emergencyWithdraw is done, people wont be able to withdraw their feesAll the balances will be reset

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

swapStablecoinToToken(address,uint256).details: the function is to be called by the stableswap wrapper to swap stablecoin to tokens

params._amount: the amount of stablecoin to be swapped
params._usr: the address of the user that receives the tokens

swapTokenToStablecoin(address,uint256).details: the function is to be called by the stableswap wrapper to swap tokens to stablecoin

params._amount: the amount of tokens to be swapped
params._usr: the address of the user that receives the stablecoin

withdrawFees(address,uint256,uint256).details: the function is to be called by the stableswap wrapper to withdraw fees

params._amountFXDFee: the amount of fees in stablecoin to be withdrawn
params._amountTokenFee: the amount of fees in tokens to be withdrawn
params._destination: the address of the user that receives the fees

withdrawToken(address,uint256).details: the function is to be called by the stableswap wrapper to withdraw tokens

params._amount: the amount of tokens to be withdrawn
params._token: the address of the token to be withdrawn

initializeFeesAfterUpgrade().notice: the function is to be called by the owner to initialize the fees after upgrade

udpateTotalValueDeposited().notice: the function is to only mitigate the bad storage after upgrade.
